verses.verse: After <S%H310><s%> this Job <S%H347><s%> opened <S%H6605><s%> his mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and cursed <S%H7043><s%> the day of his birth. <S%H3117><s%>
Then Job <S%H347><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said: <S%H559><s%>
"Let the day <S%H3117><s%> perish <S%H6><s%> in which I was born, <S%H3205><s%> the night <S%H3915><s%> which said, <S%H559><s%> <S%H1397><s%> 'There is a boy conceived. <S%H2029><s%>'
Let that day <S%H3117><s%> be darkness. <S%H2822><s%> Don't <S%H433><s%> let God from above <S%H4605><s%> seek <S%H1875><s%> for it, <S%H5105><s%> neither let the light shine on it. <S%H3313><s%>

Let darkness <S%H2822><s%> and the shadow of death <S%H6757><s%> claim <S%H1350><s%> it for their own. <S%H6053><s%> Let a cloud dwell <S%H7931><s%> on it. <S%H3650><s%> Let all that makes black the day <S%H3117><s%> terrify it. <S%H1204><s%>

As for that night, <S%H3915><s%> let thick darkness <S%H652><s%> seize <S%H3947><s%> on it. <S%H2302><s%> Let it not rejoice among the days <S%H3117><s%> of the year. <S%H8141><s%> Let it not come <S%H935><s%> into the number <S%H4557><s%> of the months. <S%H3391><s%>
Behold, <S%H3915><s%> let that night be barren. <S%H1565><s%> Let no joyful voice <S%H7445><s%> come therein. <S%H935><s%>
Let them curse <S%H5344><s%> it who curse <S%H779><s%> the day, <S%H3117><s%> who are ready <S%H6264><s%> to rouse up <S%H5782><s%> leviathan. <S%H3882><s%>

Let the stars <S%H3556><s%> of its twilight <S%H5399><s%> be dark. <S%H2821><s%> Let it look <S%H6960><s%> for light, <S%H216><s%> but have none, <S%H7200><s%> neither let it see the eyelids <S%H6079><s%> of the morning, <S%H7837><s%>
because it didn't <S%H5462><s%> shut up the doors <S%H1817><s%> of my mother <S%H990><s%>'s womb, nor did it hide <S%H5641><s%> trouble <S%H5999><s%> from my eyes. <S%H5869><s%>
"Why didn't <S%H4191><s%> I die from the womb? <S%H7358><s%> Why didn't <S%H1478><s%> I give up the spirit when my mother <S%H990><s%> bore me? <S%H3318><s%>
Why did the knees <S%H1290><s%> receive <S%H6923><s%> me? <S%H7699><s%> Or why the breast, that I should nurse? <S%H3243><s%>
For now should I have lain down <S%H7901><s%> and been quiet. <S%H8252><s%> I should have slept, <S%H3462><s%> then I would have been at rest, <S%H5117><s%>
with kings <S%H4428><s%> and counselors <S%H3289><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> who built <S%H1129><s%> up waste places for themselves; <S%H2723><s%>
or with princes <S%H8269><s%> who had gold, <S%H2091><s%> who filled <S%H4390><s%> their houses <S%H1004><s%> with silver: <S%H3701><s%>
or as a hidden <S%H2934><s%> untimely birth <S%H5309><s%> I had not been, <S%H5768><s%> as infants who never saw <S%H7200><s%> light. <S%H216><s%>
There the wicked <S%H7563><s%> cease <S%H2308><s%> from troubling. <S%H7267><s%> There the weary <S%H3019><s%> are at rest. <S%H5117><s%>
There the prisoners <S%H615><s%> are at ease <S%H7599><s%> together. <S%H3162><s%> They don't <S%H8085><s%> hear the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the taskmaster. <S%H5065><s%>
The small <S%H6996><s%> and the great <S%H1419><s%> are there. <S%H5650><s%> The servant is free <S%H2670><s%> from his master. <S%H113><s%>
"Why is light <S%H216><s%> given <S%H5414><s%> to him who is in misery, <S%H6001><s%> life <S%H2416><s%> to the bitter <S%H4751><s%> in soul, <S%H5315><s%>
Who long <S%H2442><s%> for death, <S%H4194><s%> but it doesn't <S%H2658><s%> come; and dig for it more than for hidden treasures, <S%H4301><s%>
who rejoice <S%H8056><s%> exceedingly, <S%H1524><s%> and are glad, <S%H7797><s%> when they can find <S%H4672><s%> the grave? <S%H6913><s%>
Why is light given to a man <S%H1397><s%> whose way <S%H1870><s%> is hidden, <S%H5641><s%> whom God <S%H433><s%> has hedged in? <S%H5526><s%>
For my sighing <S%H585><s%> comes <S%H935><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> I eat. <S%H3899><s%> My groanings <S%H7581><s%> are poured out <S%H5413><s%> like water. <S%H4325><s%>
For the thing which I fear <S%H6342><s%> comes <S%H857><s%> on me, <S%H3025><s%> That which I am afraid of comes to me. <S%H935><s%>
I am not at ease, <S%H8252><s%> neither am I quiet, <S%H8252><s%> neither have I rest; <S%H8252><s%> but trouble <S%H7267><s%> comes. <S%H935><s%>"
